reference.title: Synology WRX560 Hardware Parts
reference.shortdesc: Knowing the different parts of your Synology WRX560 router's hardware is key to a proper set-up!

dlentry.dd: The router that connects to your modem using network cables, allowing your devices to access the internet.
The device that links your home to your Internet Service Provider and converts the incoming network signal into a format your router and devices can use.
The adapter that converts AC (alternating current) from your wall outlet into DC (direct current) to supply the router with the proper power and voltage.
The cable used to connect your router to wired devices, such as computers, to provide a stable network connection.
